name: Crush Control
description:
A  one-level, button mashing RPG, where you defeat enemies to raise your stats. You can bind your attacks and movement to any button you want, with partial controller support. Feel free to run around and play with the mechanics. 

Credits:

dwtiger2004 - Programming

Kemasc - Art, Sprites, and Animation

(Tilemap used made by GuttyKreum)
